text: Aled Jones, (born 29 December 1970) is a Welsh singer and radio and television presenter. He is known for working with BBC and ITV, and radio (for BBC Radio Wales and Classic FM). He presented Daybreak (2012–2014)."Daybreak relaunch: Lorraine Kelly, Aled Jones start on September 3" Kate Goodacre, Digital Spy, 23 August 2012 For the BBC, he has presented Cash in the Attic (2010–2012), Escape to the Country (2010–2013) and Going Back Giving Back (2016–present). ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Welsh singers Category:Welsh musicians Category:BBC people Category:British television presenters Category:British radio personalities Category:British drummers
title: Aled Jones
